Class OwnerGraphStructure

java.lang.Object
iscte.se.landmanagement.OwnerGraphStructure
public class OwnerGraphStructure extends Object
Represents a graph structure to model relationships between property owners based on property adjacency. Supports operations such as calculating exchanges, fitness of exchanges, and identifying islands of properties owned by the same owner.

    (package private) static class 
    OwnerGraphStructure.NeighbourEdge
    Represents an edge between owners, holding the pairs of properties involved in the relationship.
    private static class 
    OwnerGraphStructure.PairComparator
    Comparator class for comparing PropertyPair instances based on exchange fitness.
    static class 
    OwnerGraphStructure.PropertyPair
    Represents a pair of properties with associated owners.

    • calcAvgAreaIncrease

      public static javafx.util.Pair<Double,Double> calcAvgAreaIncrease(OwnerGraphStructure ogs, OwnerGraphStructure.PropertyPair exchange)
      Calculates the average area increase for a potential property exchange.
      Parameters:
      ogs - the owner graph structure
      exchange - the property pair to exchange
      Returns:
      a pair containing the average area increases for both owners

    • exchangeFitness

      public static double exchangeFitness(OwnerGraphStructure ogs, OwnerGraphStructure.PropertyPair exchange)
      Calculates the fitness of exchanging two properties between owners.
      Parameters:
      ogs - the owner graph structure
      exchange - the pair of properties to exchange
      Returns:
      the fitness value

    • sortExchangesByFitness

      public void sortExchangesByFitness(List<OwnerGraphStructure.PropertyPair> exchanges)
      Sorts a list of PropertyPair instances by fitness in descending order.
      Parameters:
      exchanges - the list of PropertyPair objects to be sorted

    • generateAllExchanges

      public List<OwnerGraphStructure.PropertyPair> generateAllExchanges()
      Generates all possible property exchanges based on the graph structure. The exchanges are sorted by fitness in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of all possible PropertyPair exchanges

    • checkIsMiddle

      private boolean checkIsMiddle(Property prop)
      Checks if a property is considered a "middle" property, meaning it has more than one owned neighbor.
      Parameters:
      prop - the property to check
      Returns:
      true if the property has more than one owned neighbor, false otherwise

    • searchOwnedNeighbours

      private List<Property> searchOwnedNeighbours(Property prop, Set<Property> ban_list)
      Searches for all neighbors of a property that are owned by the same owner, excluding those in the ban list.
      Parameters:
      prop - the property whose neighbors are being searched
      ban_list - the set of properties to exclude from the results
      Returns:
      a list of neighboring properties owned by the same owner

    • calcIslands

      private void calcIslands(Map<Property,OwnerGraphStructure.IslandMember> islands, Map<Integer,OwnerGraphStructure.IslandInfo> island_owners)
      Calculates islands of connected properties owned by the same owner. Updates the given maps with island information for each property and owner.
      Parameters:
      islands - a map to store island metadata for each property
      island_owners - a map to store aggregated island information for each owner
